name: Cyber Bryce 2000
description:
You are Cyber-Kolonel Jack Bryce. And your middle name is action! You are the one and only Cyber-Kolonel Jack "Action" Bryce!

You have to save the world, you have to save the secret data, protected by the autonomous machines of the terrorists!

Chose between 3 different weapons to destroy the machines and use your special ability to go back in time and outsmart the enemies!

Escape the lab of your creators and save the world!

Created by telumv, jakisAA, boolean and Pershing_II

Controls:

  • Use WASD to move and the mouse to aim. Weapons can be used after finding them.
  • Health packs (pink boxes) can be found in the levels.
  • Press 1 to use your effective plasma pistol.
  • Press 2 to use your sharp cyber sword.
  • Press 3 to use your devastating grenade launcher.
